verses.name: Ruth 4:6
verses.text: And the kinsman said, I cannot redeem it for myself, lest I mar mine own inheritance: redeem thou my right to thyself; for I cannot redeem it.

verses.name: Ruth 4:7
verses.text: Now this was the manner in former time in Israel concerning redeeming and concerning changing, for to confirm all things; a man plucked off his shoe, and gave it to his neighbour: and this was a testimony in Israel.

verses.name: Ruth 4:8
verses.text: Therefore the kinsman said unto Boaz, Buy it for thee. So he drew off his shoe.
